article.title: SRA Award To Cover OASD(R&E) Subject Matter Expertise
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: SRA International Incorporated, Fairfax, Virginia, has won a blanket purchase agreement from the Office of the Assistant Secretary of Defense, Research and Engineering. The multi-award contract has an estimated value of $100 million over five years, if all options are exercised. As one of five awardees, SRA will provide subject matter expertiseÂ in engineering, Defense Department acquisition and program management.
